

```{r, 'mono-table'}
read_csv(here("data", "tidy", "table_mono_model_summary.csv"), na = "NA") %>% 
  mutate_at(.vars = c("Estimate", "HDI"), 
            str_replace, pattern = "-", replacement = "&minus;") %>% 
  mutate(Parameter = str_replace(Parameter, "x", "&#215;")) %>% 
  knitr::kable(format = "pandoc", 
    align = c("l", "l", "r", "r", "r", "r"), 
    caption = "Model summary for VOT and burst metrics as a function of language (English, Spanish), phoneme (/d/, /t/), F1, F2, and item repetition for monolingual coronal stops. The percentage of the HDI contained within the ROPE is based on an effect size of &plusmn; 0.1.", 
    label = "mono-table")
```
